name: WebGLRenderingContext.compileShader
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.compileShader() method of the WebGL API compiles a GLSL shader into binary data so that it can be used by a WebGLProgram.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'compileShader' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
